name: weather-app
description: Get the weather details from all over the world with a interactive map.

scripts.bas: npm run build && npm run start-server
scripts.prebuild: echo "Welcome, first removing the dist directory" && exit 0 && npm run clearDist
scripts.build: npm run buildhtml & npm run buildcss & npm run buildassets & npm run buildjs
scripts.postbuild:
echo "$(tput setaf 4)Build succeeded!$(tput sgr 0)
To run website run: $(tput setaf 2)npm run start-server$(tput sgr 0)"

author: Jelmer Overeem <jelmer_overeem@hotmail.com>
